member.name: T:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner
member.summary: Class for running queries against teamspeak 3 server

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.#ctor(TS3QueryLib.Core.Common.IQueryDispatcher)
member.summary: Creates an instance of QueryRunner using the provided dispatcher
member.param: The dispatcher used to send commands

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.SendCommand(TS3QueryLib.Core.CommandHandling.Command)
member.summary: Send the command to the undlerying socket

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.SendRaw(System.String)
member.summary: Send the message in plain to the socket

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.Quit
member.summary: Closes the ServerQuery connection to the TeamSpeak 3 Server instance.

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.Login(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Authenticates with the TeamSpeak 3 Server instance using given ServerQuery login credentials.

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.Logout
member.summary: Deselects the active virtual server and logs out from the server instance.

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.GetVersion
member.summary: Displays the servers version information including platform and build number.

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.GetHostInfo
member.summary: Displays detailed connection information about the server instance including uptime, number of virtual servers online, traffic information, etc.

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.GetInstanceInfo
member.summary: Displays the server instance configuration including database revision number, the file transfer port, default group IDs, etc.

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.EditServerInstance(TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.HelperClasses.ServerInstanceModification)
member.summary: Changes the server instance configuration using given properties.

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.GetBindingList
member.summary: Displays a list of IP addresses used by the server instance on multi-homed machines.

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.SelectVirtualServerById(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Selects the virtual server specified with virtualServerId to allow further interaction. The ServerQuery client will appear on the virtual server and acts like a real TeamSpeak 3 Client, except it's unable to send or receive voice data.
member.param: The id of the virtual server

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.SelectVirtualServerByPort(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Selects the virtual server specified with virtualServerPort to allow further interaction. The ServerQuery client will appear on the virtual server and acts like a real TeamSpeak 3 Client, except it's unable to send or receive voice data.
member.param: The port of the virtual server

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.GetServerListShort
member.summary: Gets a list of virtual servers with 3 properties for each virtual server: ID, Port and Status.

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.GetServerList(System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Displays a list of virtual servers including their ID, status, number of clients online, etc. If you're using the -all option, the server will list all virtual servers stored in the database. This can be useful when multiple server instances with different machine IDs are using the same database. The machine ID is used to identify the server instance a virtual server is associated with. The status of a virtual server can be either online, none and virtual. While online and none are self- explanatory, virtual is a bit more complicated. Whenever you select a virtual server which is currently stopped, it will be started in virtual mode which means you are able to change its configuration, create channels or change permissions, but no regular TeamSpeak 3 Client can connect. As soon as the last ServerQuery client deselects the virtual server, its status will be changed back to none.
member.param: whether to get only local servers
whether to include the virtual servers unique id

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.GetServerIdByPort(System.UInt16)
member.summary: Returns the id of the virtual server using the specified voice port

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.DeleteServer(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Deletes the virtual server specified with virtualServerId. Please note that only virtual servers in stopped state can be deleted.

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.CreateServer(TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.HelperClasses.VirtualServerModification)
member.summary: Creates a new virtual server using the given properties and displays its ID and initial administrator token. If virtualserver_port is not specified, the server will test for the first unused UDP port. The first virtual server will be running on UDP port 9987 by default. Subsequently started virtual servers will be running on increasing UDP port numbers.

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.StartVirtualServer(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Starts the virtual server specified with sid. Depending on your permissions, you're able to start either your own virtual server only or all virtual servers in the server instance.

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.StopVirtualServer(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Stops the virtual server specified with sid. Depending on your permissions, you're able to stop either your own virtual server only or all virtual servers in the server instance.

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.StopServerProcess
member.summary: Stops the entire TeamSpeak 3 Server instance by shutting down the process.

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.GetServerInfo
member.summary: Displays detailed configuration information about the selected virtual server including unique ID, number of clients online, configuration, etc.

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.GetServerConnectionInfo
member.summary: Displays detailed connection information about the selected virtual server including uptime, traffic information, etc.

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.EditServer(TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.HelperClasses.VirtualServerModification)
member.summary: Changes the selected virtual servers configuration using given properties.

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.GetServerGroupList
member.summary: Displays a list of server groups available. Depending on your permissions, the output may also contain global ServerQuery groups and template groups.

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.AddServerGroup(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new server group using the name specified with name and displays its ID.
member.param: Name of the new group to create

member.summary: Creates a new server group using the name specified with name and displays its ID.
member.param: Name of the new group to create
Type of the new group to create

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.DeleteServerGroup(System.UInt32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Deletes the server group specified with sgid. If force is set to 1, the server group will be deleted even if there are clients within
member.param: Id of the group to delete
force deletion even when clients are assigned this group

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.RenameServerGroup(System.UInt32,System.String)
member.summary: Changes the name of the server group specified with sgid.
member.param: The id of the group to rename
the new name of the group

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.GetServerGroupPermissionList(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Displays a list of permissions assigned to the server group specified with sgid.
member.param: The id of the group to get permissions for

member.summary: Displays a list of permissions assigned to the server group specified with sgid.
member.param: The id of the group to get permissions for
If set to true, the returned permissions have the Id property set to 0 and the name property will be filled with the permission name

member.summary: Adds the specified permission to the server group specified with sgid.

member.summary: Adds a set of specified permissions to the server group specified with sgid. Multiple permissions can be added by providing the four parameters of each permission.

member.summary: Removes a set of specified permissions from the server group specified with sgid. Multiple permissions can be removed at once.

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.AddClientToServerGroup(System.UInt32,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Adds a client to the server group specified with sgid. Please note that a client cannot be added to default groups or template groups.
member.param: The id of the server group
The database id of the client

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.DeleteClientFromServerGroup(System.UInt32,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Removes a client from the server group specified with sgid.
member.param: The id of the server group
The database id of the client

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.GetServerGroupClientList(System.UInt32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Displays the IDs of all clients currently residing in the server group specified with sgid. If you're using the -names option, the output will also contain the last known nickname and the unique identifier of the clients.
member.param: The id of the server group
whether to include nickname and unique id

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.GetServerGroupsByClientId(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Displays all server groups the client specified with cldbid is currently residing in.

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.GetServerSnapshot
member.summary: Displays a snapshot of the selected virtual server containing all settings, groups and known client identities. The data from a server snapshot can be used to restore a virtual servers configuration, channels and permissions using the serversnapshotdeploy command.

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.DeployServerSnapshot(System.String)
member.summary: Restores the selected virtual servers configuration using the data from a previously created server snapshot. Please note that the TeamSpeak 3 Server does NOT check for necessary permissions while deploying a snapshot so the command could be abused to gain additional privileges.
member.param: The data that was got by calling GetServerSnapshot()

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.RegisterForNotifications(TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.HelperClasses.ServerNotifyRegisterEvent,System.Nullable{System.UInt32})
member.summary: Registers for a specified category of events on a virtual server to receive notification messages. Depending on the notifications you've registered for, the server will send you a message on every event in the view of your ServerQuery client (e.g. clients joining your channel, incoming text messages, server configuration changes, etc). The event source is declared by the event parameter while id can be used to limit the notifications to a specific channel.

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.UnregisterNotifications
member.summary: Unregisters all events previously registered with servernotifyregister so you will no longer receive notification messages.

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.SendGlobalMessage(System.String)
member.summary: Sends a text message to all clients on all virtual servers in the TeamSpeak 3 Server instance.

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.SendTextMessage(TS3QueryLib.Core.CommandHandling.MessageTarget,System.UInt32,System.String)
member.summary: Sends a text message a specified target. The type of the target is determined by targetmode while target specifies the ID of the recipient, whether it be a virtual server, a channel or a client.

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.GetLogEntries(System.UInt16)
member.summary: Displays a specified number of entries from the servers log. Depending on your permissions, you'll receive entries from the server instance log and/or your virtual server log. Using a combination of the comparator and timestamp parameters allows you to filter for log entries based on a specific date/time.
member.param: The max amount of entries to retrieve (30)

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.GetLogEntries(System.UInt16,System.Nullable{System.Char},System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Displays a specified number of entries from the servers log. Depending on your permissions, you'll receive entries from the server instance log and/or your virtual server log. Using a combination of the comparator and timestamp parameters allows you to filter for log entries based on a specific date/time.
member.param: The max amount of entries to retrieve (30)

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.AddLogEntry(TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.HelperClasses.LogEntryLight)
member.summary: Writes a custom entry into the servers log. Depending on your permissions, you'll be able to add entries into the server instance log and/or your virtual servers log. The loglevel parameter specifies the type of the entry.

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.AddLogEntry(TS3QueryLib.Core.CommandHandling.LogLevel,System.String)
member.summary: Writes a custom entry into the servers log. Depending on your permissions, you'll be able to add entries into the server instance log and/or your virtual servers log. The loglevel parameter specifies the type of the entry.

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.GetChannelList(System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Displays a list of channels created on a virtual server including their ID, order, name, etc. The output can be modified using several command options.
member.param: if set to true topic is included
if set to true flag parameters are included
if set to true voice parameters are included
if set to true limit parameters are included
if set to true icon parameter is included

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.MoveChannel(System.UInt32,System.UInt32,System.Nullable{System.UInt16})
member.summary: Moves a channel to a new parent channel with the ID cpid. If order is specified, the channel will be sorted right under the channel with the specified ID. If order is set to 0, the channel will be sorted right below the new parent.
member.param: The id of the channel to move
the order used under the new target parent channel id

member.summary: Displays a list of clients online on a virtual server including their ID, nickname, status flags, etc. The output can be modified using several command options. Please note that the output will only contain clients which are currently in channels you're able to subscribe to.

if set to true, the away info is included
if set tot true, the voice info is included
if set to true, the group info is included

if set to true, time information is included
if set to true, icon information is included
if set to true, country information is included

member.summary: Displays a list of client identities known by the server including their database ID, last nickname, etc.
member.param: the index of the first record to return (starting at 0). Default is 0.
The amount of records to return. Default is 25
If set to true, the property TotalClientsInDatabase of the response is filled with the whole amount of records in database.

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.FindClientDatabaseIds(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Displays a list of client database IDs matching a given pattern. You can either search for a clients last known nickname or his unique identity by using the -uid option.

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.EditDatbaseClient(System.Int32,TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.HelperClasses.ClientModification)
member.summary: Changes a clients settings using given properties.
member.param: the id of the database client to edit

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.DeleteClientFromDatabase(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Deletes a clients properties from the database.

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.GetClientIdsByUniqueId(System.String)
member.summary: Displays all client IDs matching the unique identifier specified by cluid.

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.GetClientDatabaseIdsByUniqueId(System.String)
member.summary: Displays the database ID matching the unique identifier specified by cluid.

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.GetClientNameAndDatabaseIdByUniqueId(System.String)
member.summary: Displays the database ID and nickname matching the unique identifier specified by cluid.

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.GetClientNameAndUniqueIdByClientDatabaseId(System.UInt32)

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.UpdateServerQueryLogin(System.String)
member.summary: Updates your own ServerQuery login credentials using a specified username. The password will be auto-generated.
member.param: username to generate new a new password for

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.UpdateCurrentQueryClient(TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.HelperClasses.ClientModification)
member.summary: Change your ServerQuery clients settings using given properties.

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.MoveClient(System.UInt32,System.UInt32,System.String)
member.summary: Moves one or more clients specified with clid to the channel with ID cid. If the target channel has a password, it needs to be specified with cpw. If the channel has no password, the parameter can be omitted.
member.param: the id of the client to move
the id of the target channel
the password of the target channel

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.KickClient(System.UInt32,TS3QueryLib.Core.CommandHandling.KickReason,System.String)
member.summary: Kicks one client specified with clid from his currently joined channel or from the server, depending on reasonid. The reasonmsg parameter specifies a text message sent to the kicked client. This parameter is optional and may only have a maximum of 40 characters.
member.param: the id of the client to kick
the reason for kicking as text

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.KickClients(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.UInt32},TS3QueryLib.Core.CommandHandling.KickReason,System.String)
member.summary: Kicks one or more clients specified with clid from their currently joined channel or from the server, depending on reasonid. The reasonmsg parameter specifies a text message sent to the kicked clients. This parameter is optional and may only have a maximum of 40 characters.
member.param: the ids of the clients to kick
the reason for kicking as text

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.PokeClient(System.UInt32,System.String)

member.param: The id of the client to poke

member.summary: Displays all permissions assigned to a client for the channel specified with cid. If permid is set to 0, all permissions will be displayed.

member.summary: Displays the IDs of all clients, channels or groups using the permission specified with permid.

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.ResetPermissions
member.summary: Restores the default permission settings on the selected virtual server and creates a new initial administrator token. Please note that in case of an error during the permreset call - e.g. when the database has been modified or corrupted - the virtual server will be deleted from the database. The new admin token is returned by this method.

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.GetPrivilegeKeyList
member.summary: Displays a list of privilege keys available including their type and group IDs. Privilege keys can be used to gain access to specified server or channel groups.

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.AddPrivilegeKey(System.Boolean,System.UInt32,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Create a new PrivilegeKey. If tokentype is set to 0, the ID specified with tokenid1 will be a server group ID. Otherwise, tokenid1 is used as a channel group ID and you need to provide a valid channel ID using tokenid2.
member.param: if set to true, its a server group id

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.AddPrivilegeKey(System.Boolean,System.UInt32,System.UInt32,System.String)
member.summary: Create a new PrivilegeKey. If tokentype is set to 0, the ID specified with tokenid1 will be a server group ID. Otherwise, tokenid1 is used as a channel group ID and you need to provide a valid channel ID using tokenid2.
member.param: if set to true, its a server group id

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.AddPrivilegeKey(System.Boolean,System.UInt32,System.UInt32,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair{System.String,System.String}})
member.summary: Create a new PrivilegeKey. If tokentype is set to 0, the ID specified with tokenid1 will be a server group ID. Otherwise, tokenid1 is used as a channel group ID and you need to provide a valid channel ID using tokenid2.
member.param: if set to true, its a server group id
The parameter allows you to specify a set of custom client properties. This feature can be used when generating tokens to combine a website account database with a TeamSpeak user.

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.AddPrivilegeKey(System.Boolean,System.UInt32,System.UInt32,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair{System.String,System.String}})
member.summary: Create a new PrivilegeKey. If tokentype is set to 0, the ID specified with tokenid1 will be a server group ID. Otherwise, tokenid1 is used as a channel group ID and you need to provide a valid channel ID using tokenid2.
member.param: if set to true, its a server group id
The parameter allows you to specify a set of custom client properties. This feature can be used when generating tokens to combine a website account database with a TeamSpeak user.

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.AddPrivilegeKey(System.Boolean,System.UInt32,System.UInt32,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Create a new token. If tokentype is set to 0, the ID specified with tokenid1 will be a server group ID. Otherwise, tokenid1 is used as a channel group ID and you need to provide a valid channel ID using tokenid2.
member.param: if set to true, its a server group id
the custome settings you want to save with the token

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.DeletePrivilegeKey(System.String)
member.summary: Deletes an existing PrivilegeKey matching the PrivilegeKey specified with token.

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.UsePrivilegeKey(System.String)
member.summary: Use a PrivilegeKey to gain access to a server or channel group. Please note that the server will automatically delete the PrivilegeKey after it has been used.

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.GetMessageList
member.summary: Displays a list of offline messages you've received. The output contains the senders unique identifier, the messages subject, etc.

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.AddMessage(System.UInt32,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sends an offline message to the client specified by cluid
member.param: the unique id of the receiver

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.GetMessage(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Displays an existing offline message with ID msgid from your inbox. Please note that this does not automatically set the flag_read property of the message.

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.UpdateMessageFlag(System.UInt32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Updates the flag_read property of the offline message specified with msgid. If flag is set to 1, the message will be marked as read.

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.DeleteMessage(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Deletes an existing offline message with ID msgid from your inbox.

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.GetComplainList
member.summary: Displays a list of complaints on the selected virtual server.

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.GetComplainList(System.Nullable{System.UInt32})
member.summary: Displays a list of complaints on the selected virtual server. If targetClientDatabaseId is specified, only complaints about the targeted client will be shown.

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.AddComplaint(System.UInt32,System.String)
member.summary: Submits a complaint about the client with database ID tcldbid to the server.

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.DeleteComplaint(System.UInt32,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Deletes the complaint about the client with ID tcldbid submitted by the client with ID fcldbid from the server.

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.DeleteAllComplaints(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Deletes all complaints about the client with database ID tcldbid from the server.

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.BanClient(System.UInt32,System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan},System.String)
member.summary: Bans the client specified with ID clid from the server. Please note that this will create two separate ban rules for the targeted clients IP address and his unique identifier.

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.GetBanList
member.summary: Displays a list of active bans on the selected virtual server.

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.AddBanRule(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan},System.String)
member.summary: Adds a new ban rule on the selected virtual server. All parameters are optional but at least one of the following must be set: ip, name, or uid.

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.DeleteBan(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Deletes the ban rule with ID banid from the server.

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.DeleteAllBans
member.summary: Deletes all active ban rules from the server.

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.InitializeFileUpload(System.UInt32,System.String,System.UInt32,System.UInt64,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a file transfer upload. clientftfid is an arbitrary ID to identify the file transfer on client-side. On success, the server generates a new ftkey which is required to start uploading the file through TeamSpeak 3's file transfer interface.
member.param: the id of the file transfer
the name of the file to upload
the id of the channel to upload the file to
the size of the file in bytes
whether to overwrite an existing file
whether to resume on an existing file

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.InitializeFileDownload(System.UInt32,System.String,System.UInt32,System.UInt64,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a file transfer download. clientftfid is an arbitrary ID to identify the file transfer on client-side. On success, the server generates a new ftkey which is required to start downloading the file through TeamSpeak 3's file transfer interface.
member.param: the id of the file transfer
the name of the file to upload
the id of the channel to upload the file to
the position of the file where to start downloading

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.GetFileTransferList
member.summary: Displays a list of running file transfers on the selected virtual server. The output contains the path to which a file is uploaded to, the current transfer rate in bytes per second, etc.

member.summary: Displays detailed information about one or more specified files stored in a channels file repository.

member.summary: Stops the running file transfer with server-side ID serverftfid.

member.name: M:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.QueryRunner.DeleteFile(System.UInt32,System.String,System.String)

member.summary: Detaches all attached handlers of all events

member.summary: Raised, when a client was banned from the server

member.summary: Raised, when a client was kicked from the server

member.summary: Raised, when a client disconnected from the server

member.name: E:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.Notification.Notifications.ClientConnectionLost
member.summary: Raised, when a client lost the connection to the server (for example when the client teamspeak app crashed)

member.name: E:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.Notification.Notifications.ClientMessageReceived
member.summary: Raised, when a private message was sent to the current query client.

member.name: E:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.Notification.Notifications.ChannelMessageReceived
member.summary: Raised, when a message was sent to the channel the current query client has joined.

member.name: E:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.Notification.Notifications.ServerMessageReceived
member.summary: Raised, when a message was sent to the server the current query client is connected to.

member.summary: Raised, when a client moved himself to another channel

member.name: E:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.Notification.Notifications.ClientMoved
member.summary: Raised, when a client moved himself to another channel

member.name: E:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.Notification.Notifications.ClientMoveForced
member.summary: Raised, when a client was moved to another channel by another client

member.name: E:TS3QueryLib.Core.Query.Notification.Notifications.ClientJoined
member.summary: Raised, when a client joined the server

The optional list of clients from GetClientList-Method
